headline: Fitch Affirms AES Espana at 'BB-'; Outlook Remains Positive
summary: Fitch Ratings has affirmed AES Espana B.V.'s Long-Term Foreign Currency Issuer Default Rating at 'BB-' with a Positive Outlook, as well as affirmed the USD300 million notes due 2028 at 'BB-'.The...
